title: Skye Wheatley shows off her incredible post-baby body in a snakeskin bikini
text:
She gave birth to her first child, son Forest, just 10 months ago.

And Skye Wheatley, 25, wowed fans on Thursday when she showed off her incredible post-baby body.

Channelling Lady Gaga for what appeared to be a Halloween-themed photo shoot, former Big Brother star Skye flaunted her impossibly flat and muscular abs in a fluorescent yellow snakeskin bikini.

'I’m at a loss, you are absolute goals': Former Big Brother star Skye Wheatley sent fans into a frenzy on Thursday as she showed off her incredible post- baby body in a snakeskin bikini after giving birth 10 months ago

She teamed the high-cut swimsuit with a sheer black T-shirt knotted at the waist, and a pair of matching yellow and perspex stilettos.

Rounding out her playful look was a baby pink bob wig.

'Oops sorry forgot to upload one of my fav’s to the carousal. Lady Gaga had a stress day... nothing these yellow pumps can’t fix,' she wrote in the caption.

Skye's fans were whipped into a frenzy over her sexy snaps, marvelling over her amazing physique.

'Honestly do I need to have a baby to get your body cause I’m at a loss, you are absolute goals,' Bachelor star Tenille Favios wrote.

'How the f has she had a baby?' another fan commented, while one wrote, 'as if she’s had a baby wtf'.

Bad romance: Channelling Lady Gaga for what appeared to be a Halloween -themed photo shoot, Skye showed off her impossibly flat and muscular abs in a fluorescent yellow snakeskin bikini

Nailed it: She teamed the high-cut swimsuit with a sheer black t-shirt knotted at the waist and a pair of matching yellow and perspex stilettos. Rounding out her playful look was a baby pink bob wig

Skye welcomed her tiny tot on Christmas Eve last year with boyfriend Lachlan Waugh.

'Most rewarding, intense, and wonderful experience of my entire life,' Skye wrote on Instagram at the time as she announced Forest's birth.

'We couldn't be more in love. Everyone meet Forest Van Waugh.'

Lucky! Skye pinged right back into shape after giving birth to her first baby Forest 10 months ago

She later told her fans that she already wanted another baby.

'I want another one,' she said.

Skye rose to fame on the 2014 season of Big Brother Australia, where she placed third.

She announced her pregnancy in June last year when she was at the 14-week mark.

The social media star met her baby daddy Lachlan on Tinder and they have been dating for almost two years.

Motherhood: Skye gave birth to her first child, son Forest, just 10 months ago
description: She gave birth to her first child, son Forest, just 10 months ago.
